relationships.description: Umbridge's lie brought blood surging into Harry's brain.
The locket was taken as a bribe from a petty criminal and Umbridge had it.
Harry's wand was not even troubling to keep it concealed beneath the Invisibility Cloak.
Umbridge hit the edge of the balustrade.
Mrs. Cattermole's papers slid off Umbridge's lap.
The locket was being used to holster her own pureblood credentials.
